title: 1-month Free Rent during Inflation at Panomar - Don't pass up
map_address: 1100 Pacific Marina near Independence and Triump Drive
posting_body: Fully styled with high-end finishes you'd expect to see in a boutique hotel, Panomar Apartments is the kind of apartment you've been looking for.
If your personal balcony doesn't invite your eyes to see things differently, the floor-to-ceiling windows will.
From wherever you are in the Bay Area, make the short trip to Alameda.
Panomar Apartments offers luxury and convenience and it's within your means.
You really can have it all.
Let us prove it you by scheduling a tour of our Alameda apartments today!
Now renting fully renovated 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments.
This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 866 Sq.
- Roof Top Sky Deck Views - Downtown Oakland and San Francisco Skyline
- Plank Flooring in Living Areas, Fully Tiled Bathrooms
- Stainless Steel Appliances - Microwave, Refrigerator, Gas Range, Dishwasher
In Closets depending on floor plan
- One, Two, and Three Bedroom Apartment Homes
- Close to Shopping, Dining, Bus Routes and Much
Inquire for details regarding our policies!
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033
